content: Information for Visitors | Information for Visitors Tallahassee is a good place visit, and a better place to live. You can find a lot of information about Tallahassee and FSU on the web. The following are some links to good sites to start: http://www.cs.fsu.edu is the FSU Computer Science Department home page, which you probably have already visited. http://www.fsu.edu/ is the main Florida State University home page, which you should visit if you have not. It has many links to information about FSU, including paths to all of the following. http://www.visit.fsu.edu/ FSU visitor center. http://www.tallahassee.com/ is the on-line version of the Tallahassee Democrat, Tallahassee’s local newspaper. http://www.visittallahassee.com Tallahassee visitor center. http://www.homes.com/ is a search engine for real estate listings. You can also find real estate information in the Tallahassee Democrat Online (see above) and can find various individual real estate agent home pages with listings for Tallahassee using a search engine with the obvious keywords. FSU Campus is rated the most beautiful college campus in America Forms Travel Authorization Form for Visitors
